DOC.detailed_description: In Phase II study single dose 2.8 mg ( eight 0.35 mg siG12D-LODERs ) administer patient unresectable LAPC combine chemotherapy treatment ( Gemcitabine+nab-Paclitaxel ) . This first study assess response rate siG12D-LODER patient unresectable LAPC . The study two-arm design one arm receive siG12D-LODER + chemotherapy , arm receiving chemotherapy .
